lead_paragraph: The L.P.G.A.’s Match Play Championship is returning to Hamilton Farm Golf Club in Gladstone, N.J., and Sybase will again sponsor the 64-player tournament, from May 20-23. The tournament was played at the Hamilton site in 2005 and 2006 and at the Upper Montclair Country Club in Clifton, N.J., the past three years.
